entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS EARLY THIS EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS AROUND 60

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS AROUND 70
